mapper.select: SELECT pro.shp_mch shpmch, ma.shxm_mch shxmmch, mv.shxzh_mch shxzhmch, mv.shxzh sxz, sk.kcdz adress, pro.shp_tp img, sk.jg price, pro.id FROM t_mall_sku sk, t_mall_sku_attr_value mav, t_mall_attr ma, t_mall_value mv, t_mall_product pro WHERE mav.sku_id = sk.Id AND mav.shxm_id = ma.Id AND mav.shxzh_id = mv.Id AND mav.shp_id = pro.Id and pro.id IN( ${ids} ) GROUP BY pro.shp_mch
